name: Cave Escapist
description:
Cave Escapist is all about our Protagonist, Josh. Josh is a normal guy, working a normal job and in his free time, Josh loves to explore nature, especially caves or go on a hike.

In Cave Escapist Josh gets lost in a cave and cant find the way back, so he needs to find another way to make it out. There might be no enemies, but the cave is filled with other dangers to watch out for!

(Windows only)
How to install :

1. Download the .zip file
2. Unpack the .zip file
3. Start the game and have fun :)

This is my first game and it was created as part of my Game Creation class at HTK Academy.

Programs used: Aseprite, Photoshop, Unity, 

Sounds: https://www.weloveindies.com/en
